question: What are the names of projects starting before 2022?
raw_answer: Citywide Guardrail Replacement, Legacy Park Paver Repair Project, Civic Center Water Treatment Facility Phase 2
evidence_answer: Legacy Park Paver Repair Project, Citywide Guardrail Replacement, Civic Center Water Treatment Facility Phase 2
evidence:
It is
anticipated that the final design will be complete by July 2022.

There are two locations
within the City’s right-of-way and City-owned property that would require a
vehicle impact protection device. Legacy Park Paver Repair Project

(cid:131) On November 30, 2021, City Council approved an agreement with
Acoustic Technology to design the outdoor warning sirens.

(cid:190) Estimated Schedule: TBD

Disaster Projects (Construction)
None at this time

Disaster Projects (Completed)

Citywide Guardrail Replacement
Project Description: This project consisted of replacing the damaged guardrails throughout
the City caused by the Woolsey Fire on Encinal Canyon Road, Corral Canyon Road, and
Kanan Dume Road.

The project was combined with the County of Los Angeles’ damaged
guardrails. The project was completed in February 2021.

Staff

is finalizing the bid documents. (cid:190) Project Schedule:

(cid:131) Complete Design: March 2022
(cid:131) Advertise: Spring 2022
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Summer 2022
